Tutorial¶

Analysis of celloracle proceeds through multiple steps below. Please run the notebooks following the order. If you do not have ATAC-seq data and want to use default genome and TF binding information, you can skip the first and second step and start from the third step. Please refer to the celloracle paper for detailed information.

You can download all notebooks from here .

  • 1. ATAC-seq data preprocessing
  • 2. Transcription factor binding motif scan
  • 3. Single-cell RNA-seq data preprocessing
  • 4. Network analysis
  • 5. Simulation with GRNs
